text:
Crisisdosis is the third single from the album Odió a Maduro by Venezuelan singer José Rafael Cordero Sánchez.
The theme is composed as a parody song influenced by the original song Sobredosis by the Colombian group Los Titanes.
The topic talks about the social, political and economic crisis in Venezuela.
The song was released on October 7, 2020 and the lyrics were written by Cordero Sánchez.
